settings.title: Joint Tissue Regeneration
settings.content: Harnessing peptides and growth factors for vital tissue repair, fostering rejuvenated cartilage and stronger joint structure.

settings.title: Full-Spectrum Collagen
settings.content: Diverse collagen types fortify tendons, ligaments, and cartilage, ensuring optimal joint function and long-lasting resilience.

settings.title: Accelerated Recovery & Healing
settings.content: Promote faster recovery from joint injuries, with stem cells and nutrients targeting tissue repair and regeneration.

settings.title: Anti-inflammatory Omega Support
settings.content: Omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA, nurture joint health, reducing inflammation for improved mobility.

settings.title: Proactive Joint Protection
settings.content: Glycosaminoglycans and proteoglycans act as joint shock absorbers, reducing friction, ensuring fluid movement, and resisting compressive loads.

IS THE JOINT & MOBILITY STACK FOR ME?

This stack is specifically formulated for those prioritizing joint health and mobility, including longevity and recovering from injury.

settings.quote:
I feel less pain in my joints
and more energy.
settings.author: Marlene B.

settings.supporting_product_description: Joint Strength & Repair is formulated with essential nutrients and peptides to support strong, healthy, and mobile joints.
Skin, Hair & Nails is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to support healthy (and beautiful) skin, hair, and nails. Become more radiant!

settings.primary_product_description: Bone Marrow & Liver is the foundational supplement included in the Mobility & Joint Stack. It provides unique and essential support found in grass-fed and grass-finished bone marrow and liver.

settings.title: Red and yellow bone marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, brain and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Alkylglycerols
settings.nutrient_description: Support the immune system and formation of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.

settings.title: Adiponectin
settings.nutrient_description: Peptide hormone shown to support immune, metabolic, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Tissue-specific proteins, hormones, growth factors, and peptides such as bovine cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Show broad antimicrobial activity and are involved in the immune response.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Riboflavin, folate, B12, and choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, as well as immune, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Copper, biotin, and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Full-spectrum collagen (Type I-VI & IX-XI)
settings.nutrient_description: Bovine-derived collagen is critical in supporting and maintaining the overall health of your joints, tendons, and cartilage.

settings.title: Glucosamine
settings.nutrient_description: Glucosamine plays a critical role in nourishing and protecting joints, essential for function and resilience.

settings.title: Chondroitin Sulfate
settings.nutrient_description: Provides resistance to compression and acts as shock absorbers in joints.

settings.title: Trachea and Scapula Cartilage
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes wound healing and tissue repair better than other cartilage sources.

settings.title: Glycine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid that supports collagen production, stimulation, and acts as a natural moisturizing factor, enhancing tissue repair.

settings.title: Chondrocytes
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for the building and maintenance of cartilage structure.

settings.title: Proteoglycans
settings.nutrient_description: Molecules in cartilage that resist compression and act as joint shock absorbers.

settings.title: Peptides, Growth Factors, and Stem Cells
settings.nutrient_description: Promote and support the formation of red blood cells, chondrocytes (cartilage cells), osteocytes, osteoblasts, and osteoclasts (bone cells).

settings.title: Transforming Growth Factor-Beta (TGF-β)
settings.nutrient_description: A multifunctional cytokine critical for cartilage formation and maintenance.

settings.title: Activin A
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for the regulation of cartilage metabolism and joint inflammation.

settings.title: Cartilage-Inducing Factor A
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes the differentiation of mesenchymal stem cells into chondrocytes, cells essential for cartilage formation and maintenance.

settings.title: Fat-soluble Vitamins A & E
settings.nutrient_description: Necessary for optimal skin health, protection against dryness, and wound healing.

settings.title: Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Protects cells from damage and water loss as well as improves moisture retention for our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Hyaluronan (Hyaluronic Acid)
settings.nutrient_description: Controls tissue hydration, mediates repair processes, protects and lubricates soft tissues.

settings.title: Elastin
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes strength, firmness, and elasticity of our skin.

settings.title: Glycosaminoglycans
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for maintenance, regeneration, and regulation of our cells that comprise our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Bone Marrow & Liver, Joint Strength & Repair, and Skin, Hair & Nails includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: I feel fantastic. Super energized, up earlier, and ready to go.
settings.author: Anthony M.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Our Joint & Mobility Health Stack provides fundamental nutritional support for bulletproof joints and unbreakable bones.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Joint & Mobility Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is ideal if you want to prioritize joint health and mobility, including longevity and recovering from injury.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support the joints, tendons, and cartilage.
